alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; West Side Mountains South of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 4:26PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN KERN COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM PST... At 425 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 12 miles northeast of McKittrick, or 26 miles southwest of Delano, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bakersfield, Shafter, Tupman, Dustin Acres, Rosedale, Valley Acres, McKittrick, Lost Hills, Belridge, Harris Ranch, and Buttonwillow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; West Side Mountains South of 198
